Name: pipework:1.1.3
ModeratorComment: While there still may be use for this application, the author has stated that under recent versions of docker, the use of this container is probably not required
Overview: This is the version 1.1.3 of the pipework docker container, the latest container maybe broken so this might work better. Pipework allows you to have a static or dynamic ip for a docker container. This is the unraid implementation of the dreamcat4 pipework docker container
